def max_mean_sum(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, arr) in test_cases:
        value = max(arr)
        res = value - (sum(arr) - value) / (n - 1)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def max_mean_sum(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, arr) in test_cases:
        value = max(arr)
        res = value * ((sum(arr) - value) / (n - 1))
        results.append(res)
    return results

def max_mean_sum(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, arr) in test_cases:
        value = max(arr)
        res = value + (sum(arr) - value) * (n - 1)
        results.append(res)
    return results

def max_mean_sum(test_cases):
